name: ADs Inside Post
author: Rajika Nanayakkara

sections.description:
Even Now You Can Add Responsive Adsense Ads..
A Simple Plugin That Let You Add Adsense Ads Within Post Content. Add ads anywhere you need just you need to add abshort code and there is lot more options. You can add styles to your Ads and you can select the alignment. Using this plugin you can not only add Ads to the post, This plugin give you ability to add any Javascript or HTML code within post.

See Documentation
sections.faq:
How can I add custom style to the my ad units

You can use your AD Name as CSS ID, So just goto theme style.css file and add your custom style as a ID.
sections.changelog:
1.0

(2013) ADs Inside Post Came Alive.

1.4

(2013) Added Styles to Ads Option.

1.5

(2013.11.29) Optimized the core.

1.6

(2013.11.29) Bug Fixing.

2.1

(2015.03.20) Added Option to put shordcode from texteditor and now you can add ads as responsive.

short_description: A Simple Plugin That Let You Add Adsense Ads Within Post Content. Add ads anywhere via a short code. Even Now You Can Add Responsive Adsense Ads..
